column1: Adalgar Oldbank was a Bree-hobbits of Bree in the Lord of the Rings: War in the North.
He owns a shop near the Prancing Pony and sells potions and arrows. Unlike many other Bree-landers
column2: he is friendly to Rangers of the North because they are the only sources of news in Bree. He is
column4: unaware of the protection of the Rangers against the dangers of Eriador.The Lord of the Rings: War in the North
